description: This fertile agricultural land is perfect for farming, crop cultivation, and agribusiness ventures. Located in the heart of Iowa, this land offers rich soil, a reliable water supply, and easy access to local markets, making it ideal for a variety of agricultural activities.
additional_info: Water rights included, Near local market

description: This expansive livestock ranch in Texas is ideal for livestock, equestrian activities, and expansive country living. The ranch includes several barns, extensive fencing, and water troughs to support a thriving livestock operation.
additional_info: Includes 2-bedroom house, Adjacent to national park

description: This modern dairy farm in Wisconsin is designed for both traditional and modern farming practices. It features state-of-the-art milking equipment, ample storage facilities, and vast pasture land, making it an excellent choice for dairy farming.

Located in Napa Valley, this charming vineyard is a prime location for viticulture. It offers the perfect environment for growing grapes and producing wine, complete with a fully equipped winery, grape trellises, and a sophisticated irrigation system.

This dense forest land in Oregon offers majestic woodland areas perfect for conservation, recreation, or timber production. The land features extensive trails, diverse wildlife habitats, and well-maintained logging roads.
additional_info: Protected wildlife area, Adjacent to river

description: This historic tea plantation in Charleston is an expansive estate perfect for specialized crops like tea. It includes processing facilities, worker housing, and a comprehensive irrigation system, all set within a scenic landscape of historical significance.
